name: PeacefulSounds
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peaceful sounds
des:
Peaceful sounds is a simple skill that helps you relax or meditate while playing a couple peaceful melodies. The music is played in an infinite loop . 
To begin, say "Alexa, open Peaceful Sounds." After a brief greeting, the music will play shortly after and you can stop or pause the music.
